TopicTitle: What planet are you most interested in?

Articles.Content: Hi guys I'm new I bought the game last month and I wanna know which planet in .17 are you most excited about/interested in. I am most interested in the Gas Giant it's my favorite color:P
I am totally going to land on one of Giant's moons. The planet will look awesome from Vall's surface. Or the oceanic one seems nice to watch Jool rising.
Definitely Bop! Just for the name, and it makes me think Titan AE and planet Bob. You cannot call a planet Bob, so might as well turn that b upside down.

I am actualy exited about moho (if thats what its called) even if is not released this update, I can imagine the dramatic looking planet with glowing lava lakes and streams spreading across the daylight side contrasting with the gloomy dark mysterious night side. When you look up from the daylight side you see a massive flaring fireball in half the sky and with little apmosphere, the void of space. I dont want it to be rushed if it cant make it.

Cowzgomooz, there is already a thread with almost this same exact title right here -> http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17968-which-planet-are-you-most-excited-for

Is there really a need for a second thread?
